text: James Joseph Pappin (September 10, 1939 â€“ June 29, 2022) was a Canadian professional ice hockey right winger. He played in the of the National Hockey League (NHL). He won the Stanley Cup in 1964 and 1967 with the Toronto Maple Leafs. He also played for the Chicago Black Hawks. Pappin died on June 29, 2022 at his home in Palm Desert, California. Before he died, Pappin said that he was diagnosed with cancer. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:California Golden Seals players Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Cleveland Barons (NHL) players Category:Ice hockey people from Greater Sudbury Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
title: Jim Pappin
